content.title: PLCs
key_points: Ladder logic and other IEC 61131-3 PLC programming languages
Industrial automation and machine control using PLC-based systems
Real-time monitoring and control of discrete and continuous processes
Interface with field I/O: sensors, switches, actuators, and motor drives
Integration with HMI/SCADA systems and industrial communication networks
content.statement: PLCs are a fundamental concept in electrical engineering that provide essential knowledge for understanding related topics and industrial/practical applications.

explanation.intuition: Understanding PLCs helps build foundational knowledge. The concept connects to broader principles in the field.
explanation.key_insight: The key aspects of PLCs include core principles, common applications, and integration with related concepts.
explanation.technical_details: Technical details involve specific mechanisms, measurements, and evidence-based applications of PLCs.
